TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Update the CommentText about a Unit.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to update the CommentText about a Unit and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) it.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer updates the CommentText about a Unit for an Organisation or Unit Message Element, along with all its mandatory Elements. The Consumers receive the data and process them.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseInput: MIP4SLT3IS_5049 has been carried out between Producer/Provider and Consumer.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the CommentText about a Unit is updated and all Elements are processed and interpreted correctly on all Consumers' C2ISs.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer updates the CommentText within the MIP4SLT3IS_5049 created Message Element, with a textual text about a Unit (preferably a yet shared one). Values for the rest of Elements in the Message are kept.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process the example Unit and all elements that the Producer updated.
